intro.heading: Instagram that sells a night (not just likes)
paragraphs: Most pub Instagram accounts fail for one reason: they post random stuff with no plan, then give up when it doesn't move the needle.
I'll help you build a repeatable system: what to post, how to film it on a phone, how to batch it in one session, and how to get it seen by local people who actually visit pubs.
Everything is designed for real pub life and tested at The Anchor: quick to create, easy to run, and focused on bookings and footfall.

items.title: 30-day content plan
items.description: A calendar that matches your trading patterns: quiet nights, key offers, and the nights you want to sell.

items.title: Reels and Stories workflow
items.description: Simple filming prompts, scripts, and templates so you can create short-form content without overthinking.

items.title: Caption and hook templates
items.description: Ready-to-use copy that sells specific nights: quiz, Sunday lunch, sport, live music, and specials.

items.title: Local visibility routine
items.description: What to do for 10 minutes a day to get in front of local customers without spam or cringe.

items.title: AI batching system
items.description: How to plan and create content in batches so marketing stops being a daily job.

items.title: Simple weekly scorecard
items.description: A quick way to track what matters: enquiries, bookings, and which posts drove action.

steps.title: Quick audit
steps.description: Fix the basics that stop people following or booking: profile, highlights, and what you sell.

steps.title: Build your plan
steps.description: We choose one focus (midweek, food, sport, events) and map 30 days of posts around it.

steps.title: Create in batches
steps.description: You get templates and prompts so you can film and write content in one session.

steps.title: Improve what works
steps.description: We double down on the posts that drive enquiries and cut the rest.

faqs.question: Do you create the posts for us?
faqs.answer: Either. Some pubs want templates and a batching session so their team can run it. Others want hands-on support. We decide what fits your time and budget.

faqs.question: How quickly can Instagram bring customers in?
faqs.answer: You can usually see early movement in days (more messages and replies). Bankable results build over 30 days as consistency and word-of-mouth compound.

faqs.question: Do we need to post every day?
faqs.answer: No. You need consistency and posts that sell a night. We'll build a realistic schedule your pub can stick to.

faqs.question: Will it work if we don't have great photos?
faqs.answer: Yes. Phone-first content wins for pubs because it's real. I'll give you a shot list and prompts to make it easy.

faqs.question: What does it cost?
faqs.answer: £75 per hour plus VAT. No fixed retainers. Start small, prove it works, then scale support if you want.
